medical_history.chief_complaint: Constant pain in the right upper quadrant (RUQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began on an unspecified night after a meal of falafel and fries, with vomiting occurring 30 minutes later. The pain lasted into the next day with 6 episodes of vomiting before 1pm. The pain continued for 3 days, leading to the emergency department visit in the afternoon. She experienced mild improvement but has not eaten much since the night of the pain onset and had limited fluid intake.
